data.eml:eml: A revision of the Brementia - group of genera (Copepoda: Notodelphyidae), with descriptions of a new genus and four new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Boxshall, Geoff A., Marchenkov, Andrey (2007): A revision of the Brementia - group of genera (Copepoda: Notodelphyidae), with descriptions of a new genus and four new species. Zootaxa 1459: 37-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.176361
